snippet: The world’s biggest hamburger chain says bad weather hurt its sales performance in January, with sales at established United States locations falling 3.3 percent last month.
abstract: McDonald's says winter weather hurt its sales performance in January 2014, with sales at established United States locations falling 3.3 percent.
lead_paragraph: The world’s biggest hamburger chain says bad weather hurt its sales performance in January, with sales at established United States locations falling 3.3 percent last month.

headline.main: McDonald’s Blames Winter for Sour U.S. Sales Figures
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Blames Winter for Sour U.S. Sales Figures
